website_summaries.verdict: Hailing from the Keds sneaker collection, the Center Leather keeps things classic and simple. This budget-friendly kick offers comfort and support all day long. Reviewers love its good looks, perfect fit, and high-quality construction.On the other hand, the shoe only has one color option. It also feels heavier compared to other kicks from the brand. Additionally, a couple of testers find the sole to be stiff and inflexible. Overall, at its price, quality, and style, this model can be worth considering for fashionistas out there.
pros: The Keds Center Leather is easy on the pocket
Most buyers have commended the shoe for its stylish appeal, updating the look of the original Keds Center
A lot of users praise the kicks for being so comfortable
More than a handful of reviewers have shared that they get so many compliments for the Keds Center Leather shoes
The footbed is terrific and enables one to walk for hours, several testers have revealed
According to plenty of purchasers, the sneaker fits true to size
The Keds Center Leather is made up of high-quality materials, some wearers have observed
cons: This model only has one colorway
A few buyers have complained that the shoe feels heavier than other Keds lifestyle sneakers
The outsole of the Keds Center Leather is rather stiff and not very flexible, a couple of users have grumbled

customer_reviews.title: No give in the leather.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a loyal Keds customer for 20+ years, and always loved the shoes. The last 2 pair I’ve ordered have been very uncomfortable. The leather is too hard, and they don’t give at all. They weren’t like that before. Must be using a cheaper leather. I’m very sad and now have to find different shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Gimple

customer_reviews.title: Like keds, but disappointed in the leather.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of leather keds I’ve gotten and I’ve been disappointed with how stiff they are and seen to stay. They don’t seem to soften with wear.
customer_reviews.author: Diana G

customer_reviews.title: Cute but so painful
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because they had decent reviews and was hoping a $40 pair of white sneakers would be just as cute and functional as a $100 pair of white sneakers. They feel so cheaply made, theres no insole support, and the laces are tiny and thin. Unfortunately these will be returned. They are painful to walk in- the tongue is super stiff and presses into your foot with each step when you flex it. Other reviews said they don't soften up nor am I willing to risk being out $40 to try. Save your $ and try a different pair.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Geschke

customer_reviews.title: Have always wanted these leather shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this show! I receive many compliments. They are comfy and well made made.
customer_reviews.author: SmilingRN

customer_reviews.title: The best white sneakers! Just takes some breaking in at first.
customer_reviews.text: Love them, happy with the purchase, but they are a bit stiff. Also if you wear two sizes, like myself, (I’m an 8 and 8.5 Depending on the brand) go on the smaller side. I feel like these run just a little bit large, which is not a bad thing. Hopefully they loosen up a bit with wear but besides that they’re perfect. Update: once I broke these in they’re awesome. Very easy to keep clean, I clean them every few wears and they look brand new still after more than 6 months of almost daily wear. I love them so much, I wear them with everything from sports leggings to dresses. Highly recommend, updating to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: A perfect simple Ked!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, sleek, easy to wear and travel in. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: dladyshopper

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Walking Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Runs a tad longer. Needs a thick sock. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Herbert

customer_reviews.title: True to the size
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes. Well made and definitely worth the money. True to the size
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: These are so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I needed some comfy casual shoes to take on vacation. I saw the new style and fell in love with them. I wear a size 6 but ordered a 6 1/2 because other reviews stated that they ran a little small. Since I like to wear them without socks, I should have gone with the 6. I will be ordering these again. I've never been disappointed with Keds.
customer_reviews.author: binderc

customer_reviews.title: DON'T ORDER FROM SOFTMOC!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy anything from soft mock! I ordered these shoes for my grandma and they didn't fit her foot and new I am having to fight to get them returned with out having to pay postage. Even though when I ordered them they were a Amazon prime item. WARNING WHEN ORDERING READ THE FINE PRINT!
customer_reviews.author: Jill A. Aceves

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT buy these shoes. They are stitched wrong by the little toe area and it is impossible to wear them because they cause instant discomfort. I bought them for the summer and now I'm stuck with them because I can't return them.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne B

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: Loved these! They beat the canvas ones because you can easily clean them off and wear them rain or shine. They were so comfortable to wear walking around Japan for almost 2 weeks. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect - glad I read reviews suggesting you purchase your actual size and not to size up or down. This sneaker is so pretty, just a bit snug at the widest part of my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Piper

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome.. I got a size larger because I have wide feet. So glad I did they fit perfect and are so comfortable. Love them.. As usual, KEDS have always been my favorite and still are.
customer_reviews.author: Arbonne IC #25133028

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love the look but I felt like the shoes were too tight and there wasn't much cushy or supportive about them. Maybe I'm too old for these-- I'm in my 50's... anyway, I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Wildchild2533

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes but run big
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoes but they run 1/2 big. I am size 8.5 most of the time but i do go up to 9 when shoes are too narrow. I ordered this ones in my regular 8.5 size and they where way to big so have to return them and get size 8. I do own another pair of ked in a different style and on those i wear my regular size
customer_reviews.author: yanira

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome as they were in the 90's! Worn the heck out of these as I sometimes work and walk all over a massive wharehouse. Then I moved and left these out as my only shoes. Wore them day in and day out. They looked icky. After I got my washer hooked up in my new home I threw them in with bleach. Bam look almost new again! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Mom Jones

customer_reviews.title: Leather Keds
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked leather Keds. My wo yr old daughter borrowed these so I had to purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: No break in period!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were comfortable with no break in period. I’m partial to the older leather version that isn’t so “clunky”. I was not going to lower a rating because of a personal preference. As far as construction, quality, and comfort, the shoes are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love after breaking in!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They were a little stiff at first but have loosened up after wearing a bit. I am between 7 1/2 and 8 and the 7 1/2 fit perfectly! My only complaint would be the shoelaces are thin and seem cheap! I bought new 32 inch laces from Walmart for $1.50 and now they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Joni miller

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love them. As a Baby Boomer generation, Keds were my first tennis shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Girl

customer_reviews.title: I love Keds they are so comfortable 😍
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit with memory foam inside. Feels like I'm walking on air
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Blowars

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: The memory foam makes these Keds feel like walking on a cloud compared to the old Keds. I love them. The leather is good quality and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Moira Hester

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the way the feel when I am wearing them. Love keds!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Whitlock

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super cute!! Bought them for my Florida vacation where I knew I’d be doing a lot of walking. Much sleeker than my regular walking sneakers so it fit all the outfits I planned to wear on the trip! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Susan O.

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to buy you some shoes new shoelaces.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are exactly what I expected feel good or pretty and nice but the shoelaces are just too cheep and too short.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita A

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: They’re cute and the insoles are padded so it makes them so comfortable to wear !
customer_reviews.author: osiris

customer_reviews.title: Stained and dusty
customer_reviews.text: Glue stain on tag. They also have dust stains. It seems like they were sitting at a warehouse unprotected for a long time. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Julio N.

customer_reviews.title: Not Bulky
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and looks good with shorts or casual dresses.
customer_reviews.author: Mylinda Fancher

customer_reviews.title: , another high-quality product from Keds
customer_reviews.text: Once again Keds lives up to their standards I love this you!
customer_reviews.author: katharine

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought these and she loves them. She wears them all the time. Will be great for summer
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t wear them without high socks because they rub my ankles but they’re adorable, love these
customer_reviews.author: Allison I

customer_reviews.title: Heels rub on my ankle
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, but the heel rubs and hurts on both feet. Should have returned.
customer_reviews.author: Elena M.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my normal size, it was a bit big, however a thick sock works. Fast shipping and they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Shock

customer_reviews.title: Keds  shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these shoes for years. They wear very well. I will definitely buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in February , wore them 4 times and one of the grommets fell out. and now the return window is closed! So disappointing, because I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy in the Sky

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The leather is tough, so tough they rubbed blisters on my feet. These will last a long time because I don’t plan on wearing them. Bought orthopedic inserts, nothing helped. They feel cheap. My bad
customer_reviews.author: Terri L. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: LOVE MY KEDS
customer_reviews.text: Needed white sneakers and these are perfect..you can dress them up or dress them down..LOVE THEM..
customer_reviews.author: GrannysDiva

customer_reviews.title: Cute & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The air sole cushion is very comfortable. I'm normally a 7.5, but ordered an 8 because I'm pregnant and my feet are swollen. These fit very comfortably, and have a little room in them to spare.
customer_reviews.author: sarah thompson

customer_reviews.title: Odd fitting
customer_reviews.text: Long in the toe, yet narrow in width. Rubbed a blister on my heal. Not sure if buying a size smaller would help.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Mixed emotions
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are cute and comfortable, but unfortunately they sent me two different colored shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable! My favorite sneakers!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these keds!! I bought 2 white and 1 grey! They are comfy and durable and right on point with size😊
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Galindo

customer_reviews.title: Very cushy!
customer_reviews.text: They are well made classic You can wear with almost anything. Perfect runs on little big but feels like walking on clouds!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly coyle

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good looking basic sneaker and this is all that!! Cute and instantly comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Robin S. Klein

customer_reviews.title: Great quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bit bigger because the canvas Keds ran a bit smaller, however the leather ran a bit bigger but at least I can wear with a thicker sock and fits fine.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce E.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied 👌
customer_reviews.text: I was very doubtful about this purchase because I read the reviews on how uncomfortable they are but in my opinion I loved the way they fit. I bought a 5 1/2 and I don’t regret it
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: A little stiff at first but gets better once worn. I wear these to work everyday. Good quality and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Buffy Stein

customer_reviews.title: Only the best for me!
customer_reviews.text: Classic comfort and looks! A little spray on Clorox keeps them sparkling!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: That I wold recommend this shoe to family.
customer_reviews.text: I can walk very good in them, for I had one before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Keds value
customer_reviews.text: Great quality shoe as are all my keds, good quality leather, perfectly sized
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable , great quality, runs large had to get a smaller size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the fabric is very comphy.
customer_reviews.text: love my new keds.they are comfortable and the leather is soft, and the memory foam is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: kbarbara

product_meta.title: Keds womens WH60854 Center Leather
product_meta.description: The Center is the kind of hard-to-find comfort sneaker that flatters everyone. The rounded toes and sleek structure make feet look slim and dainty, while soft uppers and Dream Foam Memory footbeds provide cushiony steps right out of the box. Leather upper Lace to toe upper Feminine last Dream Foam footbed Padded collar for extra comfort Rubber outsole Care instructions: spot wash, air dry only Imported
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
Dream Foam foot bed, Leather upper, Padded collar for extra comfort, lace-up
